name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ITLIDR - It Too Long I Don't Read

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summary Article / News for you with GenAI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of endless scrolling? This Chrome extension uses AI to instantly summarize any web page and even lets you ask questions about the content. It's like TLDR on steroids!
